Fabulous Party
Fun and Personalized Party!
`

What we do

Parents want to celebrate their kids birthday with a memorable party but it is not always easy with our busy life.

At Partylicious, we take care of all the logistics so that your kid can have a perfect day and parents a stress free day.

  • Find a great theme for the party
  • Custom made Party invitation
  • Set-up and break down
  • Personalized welcome sign
  • Table and chairs for 12 guests.
  • Table setting and room decorations
  • Plates, Napkins, Cups and Forks for Each Guest
  • Run the games and crafts.
  • Party Music

We take the stress out of managing all the details and let you and your family enjoy the party!

Who we are

ZZZ was founded by Pamela Levan. Pamela is the mother of four kids ( 5 to 12 years old) and has always had fun planning original birthday parties. Her passion for kids and organizing events was the spark that lead to the creation of ZZZ.

Our commitment

We want every birthday party to be a delightful experience for the kids and the parents. This is our passion and north star. We've always made each party a success and we are planning to continue doing so for a long long time.

Contact Me

Call at 408-596-9296 or email me at hello@partilicoious.com for a free consultation.

Location

zzz
Los Gatos, CA
